EmailTemplate.name: CA - Referral Successful - Referee
EmailTemplate.subject: $100, in the name of Solar.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi (NAME),
Your Community Solar referral was successful!
You just earned $100. Click here to redeem. Share with more friends.
And be sure to give (REFEREE) a high-five.
Good things come to those who share in saving the planet. Thanks for being part of the Community! - All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Solar 111 Huntington Ave, Suite 650 Boston, MA 02199
Questions or concerns about solar? Call us at 844.768.4100 Email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
